marytts.signalproc.analysis
Class ReflectionCoefficients

java.lang.Object
  marytts.signalproc.analysis.ReflectionCoefficients

public class ReflectionCoefficients
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
sacha Implements the conversion between the Linear Prediction Coefficients (LPC) and the corresponding Reflection Coefficients. 24.03.2009 - Added lattice synthesis filter function (oytun.turk)

Method Detail

lpc2lprefc

public static double[] lpc2lprefc(double[] oneMinusA)
Converts from LPC coefficients to reflection coefficients.

Parameters:
oneMinusA - A(z) = a0 - sum { ai * z^-i } . a0 = 1.
Returns:
The reflection coefficents. If the LPC order is N, there are N reflection coefficients and (N+1) LPC coefficients (if you count a0==1).

lprefc2lpc

public static double[] lprefc2lpc(double[] k)
Converts from the reflection coefficients to the corresponding LPC coefficients.

Parameters:
k - the vector of p reflection coefficients [k_0 ... k_p-1].
Returns:
The LPC coefficents [1 -a_1 -a_2 ... -a_p].

public static double[] latticeSynthesisFilter(double[] k,
                                              double[] x)
